abstract.text: A declarative, SwiftUI-like framework for building Terminal User Interfaces in Swift.
Scales this view to fit within the parent while maintaining the
aspect ratio.
Configures which system items are shown in the status bar.
Adds a handler for specific key press events.
Adds padding on all sides.
Declares the app header content for this view.
Disables selection for this view within a List.
Sets flexible frame constraints for this view.
Sets the foreground style for this view and its children.
Sets the navigation title for this view.
Adds padding on specific edges.
Declares status bar items for this view using a builder.
Adds a badge to the view displaying a count.
Sets a preference value for this view.
Wraps this view in an AnyView for type erasure.
Sets the appearance for this view and its descendants.
Sets the status bar items for this view with a named context.
Sets the color mode for ASCII art image rendering.
Adds a handler for a single key press.
Sets the text cursor style for text fields within this view.
Sets the status bar items for this view with a named context.
Executes an action when this view disappears.
Sets the text cursor style with separate shape, animation, and speed parameters.
Sets an environment value for this view and its children.
Makes this view the notification rendering host.
Adds an action to perform when a preference value changes.
Presents a modal overlay when a binding to a Boolean value is true.
Declares this view as a focus section.
Scales this view to fill the parent while maintaining the
aspect ratio.
A control that displays an editable text interface.
Adds a border around this view.
Sets the aspect ratio and content mode for image rendering.
Adds a handler for key press events.
Presents an alert with title and actions only (no message).
Layers the specified view on top of this view.
Sets the dithering mode for ASCII art image rendering.
Sets the character set for ASCII art image rendering.
Sets the list style for List views in this view and its descendants.
Controls whether a spinner is shown while an image is loading.
Presents an alert when a binding to a Boolean value is true.
Executes an action when this view first appears.
Applies a modifier to this view.
Starts an async task when this view appears.
Sets the color palette for this view and its descendants.
Applies a dimming effect to the view content.
Presents this view as a modal dialog over dimmed content.
Sets an explicit frame size for this view.
Sets the status bar items for this view.
Declares status bar items with a specific composition strategy.
Adds padding with explicit edge insets.
Sets the preferred width for a navigation split view column.
Sets the style for toggles within this view.
Sets the text content type for text fields within this view.
Sets the placeholder text shown while an image is loading.
Sets the visibility of row separators within a list.
Sets the style for navigation split views within this view.
Adds a background color to this view.
Sets flexible width constraints for a navigation split view column.
